entry.title: U.N. Nuclear Agency Warns of Increased Risk at Ukraine's Largest Nuclear Plant
entry.content: IAEA head Rafael Grossi met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky as a part of his efforts to establish a safety zone around the plant, and Russian missiles struck the nearby city of Zaporizhzhia, killing one.

entry.title: Why Women Are Chopping Their Hair for Iran's Mahsa Amini
entry.content: The protest move, adopted by stars including French actresses Juliette Binoche and Marion Cotillard, as well as Iranian women in cities around the world, is gaining momentum across video platforms.
